Package com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.textures

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animator
    GameThread handling all animation.
    TexController
    Class holding texture info.
    TexController.TexInfo  
    TexController.TexStateInfo
    Represents a state that a texture can be in
    Texture
    Texture that can be attached to a sprite.
    Texture.TexturePart
    Represents a part of a larger texture.
    TextureLoader
    Class holding texture loading methods.
    TextureLoader.TexInfo
    TexInfo is a public, purely-organizational, class used by the Texture Loader to transfer texture info around methods.
    TextureState
    Represents a state that the texture can be in.
    TextureState.Frame
    Frame in a state.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TexController.Resolution
